      • searchInRows

        public Cell searchInRows(int number,
                         Cell first)
        Method to search in rows a cell by number
        pre: number is a number between numRows * numColumns
        pos:
        Parameters:
        number - An integer, It represents a cell number
        first - An object of Cell type, It represents the first cell
        Returns:
        A cell that corresponds with the number received as parameter

      • searchInRows

        public Cell searchInRows(char snake,
                         Cell first)
        Method to search in rows a snake by its char
        pre: the parameter Cell first is not the first cell of the game grid, instead of this it is the first cell depending on row number - 1. I mean, bottom row
        pos:
        Parameters:
        snake - A char that represents a snake within game
        first - An object of Cell type that corresponds to the first cell
        Returns:
        A cell whose snakes attribute corresponds with the char received as parameter

      • searchInRows

        public Cell searchInRows(int i,
                         int row,
                         Cell first,
                         int ladder)
        Method to search in rows a ladder by its number
        pre: row must be a integer between the range of row number
        pos:
        Parameters:
        i - An integer that represents the current row number it will use as a counter
        row - An integer that represent the number row where is the start of the ladder
        first - An object of Cell type that corresponds to the first cell
        ladder - An integer that represents a ladder
        Returns:
        A cell whose ladder attribute corresponds with the char received as parameter

      • searchFirst

        public Cell searchFirst(int row,
                        Cell first)
        Method to search the first corresponding to an specific row number
        * pre: row must be an integer between the row number range
        Parameters:
        row - An integer that represent the row number where we want to get the first cell
        first - An object of Cell type that corresponds to the first cell when the matrix is created
        Returns:
        The first cell at the row number received as parameter

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(Player player,
                       int dice)
        Method to move the player in the game grid
        pre: Player is not null
        pos: the player is assigned in the final cell which is defined using the current player position and dice
        Parameters:
        player - An object of Player type, it represents a player within a cell
        dice - An integer, it is a random number between 1 and 6
